description: Do you like Google services? Would you like to bring them at home too? So are we, so this is why we started the deployment of this project. Google@Home aim is to let control your home in your own way that could be with android device or for example your voice, with the feature of an easy installation on every kind of embedded device that have GPIO inteface and could run GNU/Linux.
